description: This file defines the RemotePlugin class within the WPEFramework::Plugin::Rust namespace, which implements a plugin interface for a Rust-based remote plugin system. It includes class declarations, methods for plugin lifecycle management, communication, and integration points, along with conditional compilation for different Thunder versions.

classes.name: RemotePlugin
classes.description: Implements a plugin interface for remote communication with Rust, managing plugin lifecycle, WebSocket communication, and callbacks within the WPEFramework environment.

methods.name: RemotePlugin
methods.description: Constructor initializing the RemotePlugin with given configuration.

methods.name: ~RemotePlugin
methods.description: Default destructor.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the provided shell environment.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin, cleaning up resources.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns information about the plugin.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Increments reference count for interface management.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decrements reference count and potentially deletes the object.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the plugin, conditionally compiled based on Thunder version.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the plugin, conditionally compiled based on Thunder version.

methods.name: Attach
methods.description: Attaches a communication channel.

methods.name: Detach
methods.description: Detaches a communication channel.

methods.name: Close
methods.description: Closes a channel, conditionally compiled.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes a callback, conditionally compiled.

methods.name: Validate
methods.description: Validates a token, method, and parameters, conditionally compiled.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Invokes a remote method, overloaded based on JSON_RPC_CONTEXT define.

methods.name: Inbound
methods.description: Handles inbound messages either by identifier or by id.

methods.name: onRead
methods.description: Processes a response received from the remote process.

methods.name: LaunchRemoteProcess
methods.description: Launches the remote process with the specified shared library, host IP, and port.

methods.name: SendTo
methods.description: Sends a JSON message to a specific channel identified by channel_id.

methods.name: WPEFramework::PluginHost::ILocalDispatcher * Local()
methods.description: unavailable
